name: Torcher
description:
Torcher is just another working stiff, but his trip home to bed requires far more of his faculties than sitting in a sconce all day. See if you have both the mental and physical skills to keep the flame alive in this platform puzzler.

Engine: Unity

Art: Asesprite

Music: Reaper

SoundFx: Zoom H6

Made for Ludum Dare 46
